resources.string: You cannot have Morgana without Percival, or Percival/Assassin/Morgana/Mordred without Merlin.
Character to be displayed during the reading of the current segment of the introduction.
EVERYONE, close your eyes, and extend your hand into a fist in front of you.
AGENTS OF EVIL, wake up, and look for other agents of Evil.
AGENTS OF EVIL, except OBERON, wake up, and look for other agents of Evil.
AGENTS OF EVIL, close your eyes.
MERLIN, wake up. AGENTS OF EVIL, stick out your thumb, so that Merlin can see who you are.
MERLIN, wake up. AGENTS OF EVIL, except MORDRED, stick out your thumb, so that Merlin can see who you are.
AGENTS OF EVIL, put your thumbs away. MERLIN, close your eyes.
PERCIVAL, wake up. MERLIN, stick out your thumb, so that Percival can see who you are.
PERCIVAL, wake up. MERLIN and MORGANA, stick out your thumb, so that Percival can see who you are.
MERLIN, put your thumb away. PERCIVAL, close your eyes.
MERLIN and MORGANA, put your thumbs away. PERCIVAL, close your eyes.
